cold
drinks
/$
$
The Hideaway Bar is Orlando's go-to for a no-frills, party time with a drink. We have bottled beer, mixed drinks, & canned seltzer (why do you drink these?). We're a legendary dive bar that serves up an eclectic mix of good times. Come shoot some pool, play some bar games, or just hang out but, make sure you do it with a drink in your hand.
​
​
Whether you're craving a cold beer, cocktail, or a stiff shot, The Hideaway has you covered. It's the kind of place where the drinks are cold, the laughs are loud, and the good times roll all night long. We're open seven days a week, 365 days a year from 7am to 2am.
/$
$

GOOD EATING
/$
$
Have you tried a Hot Marino sandwich yet? Well then order it again, or try one of our Best of Orlando burgers, or our wings, or any of our other 10 sandwiches, or our hot dogs...you get the point; we have a bunch of delicious bar food. Since 1984 we've been a fixture for good food and cold drinks – especially on Sundays if you're a Dolphins fan.
Grab some friends, pull up a barstool, take over the TouchTunes if you want (no Drake allowed) – and grab a bite to eat and watch some sports. Or, if the weather's nice (doubtful) we have patio seating and corn hole for anyone who can't just sit and drink like a normal person.

Here at the Hideaway, we love a good time. Check out some of our events for Dolphins game, holidays, trivia, and much more. Don't forget the cold beer!
